Description: You are given gifts now|you happy?|Dont cry when its not what you want
Rules Description: Gain no items this run|Gain 2 random items each turn

Description: Sales Sales Sales! With the arrival of Christmas more shops|are opening up. All the monsters are trampling around|the shops in search of gifts. It's so bad that you won't get any.
Rules Description: Enemies leave [gold]2 gold after defeating them.|Shops are more common.|Make twice as many gadgets.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Creative Crisis~[;]~Equipment:Consumerism~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Upgrade~[;]rand([~Equipment:Iced Latte~[;] ~Equipment:Scrap Kettle~])[;]~Copy~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: It's time to collect all your spells and mana[;]|because you need thrice as more spells and mana!|Shame it's only you alone[;] Witch.
Rules Description: You can use 3 spellbooks.|Start with 4 dice and without prepared spell slot.|Your starter spells are [yellow]Fruit_Bowl[][comma] [yellow]Snapdragon[][comma] and [yellow]Daffodil[].
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~~[;] [~Spell:Time Edge~[;]~Spell:Blessed Blade~[;] ~Spell:Dealmaker~]); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] rand([~Spell:Duplicate~[;]~Spell:Subdivide~[;]~Spell:Shadow Dice~[;]~Spell:Transporter~])]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~[;] [~ExtraDice:-650~[;] ~WitchUpgrade~]); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Spell:Lunasa~[;]  ~Spell:Honey Pot~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~~[;] [~Spell:Hall of Mirrors~[;] ~WitchUpgrade~]);
Script: Start Game: Spellbook.showspellbookinstructions = false; Spellbook.setto([Spellbook.spellname(1)][;][][;]0); self.setvar(~spellbook1slot1~[;]~Fruit Bowl~); self.setvar(~spellbook1slot2~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook1slot3~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook1slot4~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook1slot5~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook1slot6~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook2slot1~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook2slot2~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook2slot3~[;]~Snapdragon~); self.setvar(~spellbook2slot4~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook2slot5~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook2slot6~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook3slot1~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook3slot2~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook3slot3~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook3slot4~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook3slot5~[;]~Daffodil~); self.setvar(~spellbook3slot6~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~currentspellbook~[;]1); Rules.witch_randomspellslot[3] = [~Next Tome~]; Rules.rulescreen(~externalwitchingrules~); self.setvar(~spellbook1unavailable~[;]0); self.setvar(~spellbook2unavailable~[;]0); self.setvar(~spellbook3unavailable~[;]0); Rules.excludeenemies([~Loud Bird~[;]~Banshee~]);
Script: End Turn: if(target.hp > 0){ var booknum = self.getvar(~currentspellbook~); for(i in 1...7) { if(Spellbook.isempty(i)) { self.setvar(~spellbook~+booknum+~slot~+i[;]~Empty slot~); } else { self.setvar(~spellbook~+booknum+~slot~+i[;]Spellbook.spellname(i)); } }self.setvar(~currentspellbook~[;]self.getvar(~currentspellbook~) + 1); if(self.getvar(~currentspellbook~) == 4) { self.setvar(~currentspellbook~[;]1); } booknum = self.getvar(~currentspellbook~); for(q in 1...7) { if(self.getvar(~spellbook~+booknum+~slot~+q) != ~Empty slot~) { Spellbook.changespellflash(q[;]self.getvar(~spellbook~+booknum+~slot~+q)); } else { Spellbook.erase(q); } } }

Description: As a special gift[;] Lady Luck's letting you|abandon your Deck and use equipment normally!|...Semi-normally. She may have a grudge.
Rules Description: You no longer use a deck|You start with 3 dice.|Only one card is available at a time
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Shiny Sword~[;]~Equipment:Chaingun~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~Dice~[;] [~Equipment:Chainbump~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~~);

Description: Fight a random mighty boss |Randomized every time you play
Rules Description: Very strong boss 1 boss 1 robot go at it
Script: Start Game: self.level = 6; self.gold = 9; var database = loaddata(~diceydungeons/jackpotskills~); Rules.jackpotskills = getcolumn(database[;] ~jackpotskills~); Rules.jackpotskills_lowodds = getcolumn(database[;] ~jackpotskills_rare~); Rules.excludeenemies(getcolumn(loaddata(~diceydungeons/excludedenemies~)[;] ~robot6~)); self.usecpuinsteadofdice = true; self.roll_target = 14;

Description: Now that it's christmas[;] why not|enjoy the festive cheer[;] and|giving back is half of it!
Rules Description: Trade items with the enemy each turn
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Poison Needle~[;]~Equipment:Crowbar~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Skeleton Key~[;] ~Equipment:Hacksaw~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

leveluprewards(2[;] ~~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:The Divine Killer~[;]~Equipment:The Middle Road~[;]~Equipment:The Second Chance~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(6[;] ~~);
Script: Start Combat: var oldeqs = []; var newskills = [~Commandments~]; for (e in self.equipment) if (e.skillcard == ~~) {oldeqs.push(e.name); for (tag in e.tags) if (tag.substr(0[;]6) == ~skill:~) {newskills.push(tag.substr(6)); break;}} self.replaceskillcard(newskills.pop()); self.setvar(~oldeqs~[;]oldeqs); self.setvar(~newskills~[;] newskills)
